alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Las Animas County through 245 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonewall, or 20 miles southeast of Indian Creek on the southeastern Spring Burn Scar, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Accumulating hail could lead to hazardous conditions on roadways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonewall and Weston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
